#####
:::{#hero-heading}
Welcome to my blog, where I write about technology, innovation, and leadership. I am an experienced engineering leader and have have had the opportunity to work on a range of technologies including Cloud Computing, Kubernetes, Machine Learning, CPaaS, Multimedia Streaming, Ad Tech and DevSecOps. 

In this blog, I intend to share my insights, learnings and emerging trends on the various technical topics I have experience with. This will help journal my learnings and potentially spark conversations that can help us all grow in this rapidly changing field.
:::
